title: What is the use of LM317? - Quora

response.answer_text: Key points that you need to know about Lm317. Lm317 is a popular adjustable positive linear voltage regulator. Its a three terminal device. It requires only two external resistors to set the output voltage. Lm317 can be used as a voltage and current regulator.
LM317 is a versatile variable voltage regulator. It’s output voltage can be set from 1.25 to 37 volt and output current is 1.5 A. It’s a variable voltage regulator and hence it is versatile.
